title: Personalized English British Bulldog Beach and Bath Towels - Large and Medium Sizes - Custom Towel Travel Pool and Indoor Use Towels for Adults Kids
features: PERSONALIZED – Create a truly unique and one-of-a-kind towel for yourself or someone you love. Use the customizing tool to enter your name, their name, a funny saying, or an inside joke. Whatever you choose, we will take your text and create an exclusive product just for you that will ship in three business days or less. The top side is printed with the design you see in the example image, the back side is pure white.

FUNCTIONALITY – No matter the size or design you choose, these towels will long be a treasured member of the family. You can use them at the beach, in the bathroom, the kitchen, a golf course, the garage, anywhere you need it.

SIZE OPTIONS – With our different size towels to choose from, there is something for everyone. The medium 30”x60” towel is best used in the bathroom. The larger 35”x70” towel is ideal for days at the beach and pool.

MACHINE WASHABLE – Nothing last forever, ESPECIALLY a clean towel. One day you’re going to have to wash it, and that’s ok! All towels are made from a 100% washable poly cotton blend, and the best part is the personalized design will never fade. Because we use premium dye-sublimation materials in the production process, you can be sure that not only will the material last a lifetime, but the custom print will as well.

GREAT GIFT - Trying to find the perfect gift can be stressful, so just relax and personalize this towel, you’ve found the precise present they’re going to love. A custom gift shows how much you care, that you took the time and effort necessary to make something unique for that special someone. They don’t have to know it was a super easy process that took less than one minute, we’ll keep it our little secret!
